ai.summary: Castle Acre Circular (Short) is a gentle 4.1 km loop in the UK that winds around rural lanes and the ruins of Castle Acre, offering easy terrain and relaxed scenery suitable for families and casual walkers.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly smooth, well-maintained footpaths and grassy tracks with gentle gradients. Occasional road crossings, gates or stiles, and some muddy stretches after rain. Watch for uneven ground near the castle ruins and bring appropriate footwear.
ai.safety_notes: Sturdy footwear recommended; check weather and path conditions before you go; stay on public paths and be mindful of livestock in fields; bring a map or offline navigation, water, and sun protection; use care around ruins and seek permission on private paths; keep dogs on a leash if livestock are present.
recommended_gear: Map or offline navigation on your phone
ai.best_seasons: Spring, Summer, and Autumn are ideal, with cooler days and clearer countryside; winter walks are still possible but can be muddy and windier.

seo.title: Castle Acre Circular (Short) – Easy 4.1 km Walk in the UK
seo.meta_description: Explore Castle Acre Circular (Short), an easy 4.1 km loop in the UK featuring castle ruins, rural paths, and relaxed countryside scenery. Ideal for a family-friendly day out.
